AdditionalInfo.title: Additional info
AdditionalInfo.description: A name and value that defines an additional property of a contact role constraint, such as what loss types the constraint applies to

amountAfterLimit.title: Amount after limit
amountAfterLimit.description: The amount payable on the item(s)

dateAcquired.title: Date acquired
dateAcquired.description: Date when this item was acquired

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

incidentOrder.title: Incident order
incidentOrder.description: Order of the item on the Incident

category.title: Category
category.description: The categorization of the score. For example, a fraud system may use low_risk, medium_risk, high_risk. A total loss evaluation system may use repairable, total_loss.

exposure.title: Exposure
exposure.description: A reference to the `Exposure` that this assessment summary is associated with

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

normalizedScore.title: Normalized score
normalizedScore.description: The raw score mapped into the range 0-100. For example, a raw score of 320 out of 400 could map on a normalized score of 80.

rawAssessmentReferenceId.title: Raw assessment reference ID
rawAssessmentReferenceId.description: Reference ID to the raw assessment response

recommendedActionCode.title: Recommended action code
recommendedActionCode.description: A code corresponding to the recommended action, such as "request_witness_statement", "block_payment", "initiate_recovery", "offer_cash_settlement". This code could be used in business rules.

recommendedActionDescription.title: Recommended action description
recommendedActionDescription.description: A human readable description of the recommended action, such as "Take a recorded statement from the witness"

scoreDate.title: Score date
scoreDate.description: The date and time the external system scored the `Claim` or `Exposure`

scorePercentile.title: score percentile
scorePercentile.description: A value corresponding to where the score lies in the distribution of scores, as determined by the external system

tapSubtypeId.title: TAP subtype ID
tapSubtypeId.description: Designation to differentiate between distinct types of assessments. For example, line.

Check.title: Check
Check.description: A paper check or electronic funds transfer issued to a particular payee to deliver one or more payments

bankAccount.title: Bank account
bankAccount.description: The type of bank account that will be used as the source for the check

checkBatching.title: Check batching
checkBatching.description: How the check should be batched for sending

checkInstructions.title: Check instructions
checkInstructions.description: Special handling instructions for the check

checkNumber.title: Check number
checkNumber.description: The identifier for the check or the electronic funds transfer

checkType.title: Check type
checkType.description: Indicates if the check is the primary or secondary check within a check group

claimContact.title: Claim contact
claimContact.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the claimant the check is being written to

dateOfService.title: Date of service
dateOfService.description: The date and time the service being paid for was performed, if the check is for a service

deductionType.title: Deduction type
deductionType.description: The type of deduction for a secondary check. Only applicable if `checkType` is `secondary`.

deliveryMethod.title: Delivery method
deliveryMethod.description: The requested delivery method for the check

enteredTime.title: Entered time
enteredTime.description: The date and time that the check was actually created. Note that this is not necessarily the same as the time that the `Check` element was created in the claims system.

grossAmount.title: Gross amount
grossAmount.description: The gross amount of the check, before any deductions

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

invoiceNumber.title: Invoice number
invoiceNumber.description: The invoice number associated with this check

issueDate.title: Issue date
issueDate.description: The date and time that the check was issued

mailTo.title: Mail to
mailTo.description: The name of the person or company that the check is mailed to

mailingAddress.title: Mailing address
mailingAddress.description: The address of the person or company that the check is mailed to

memo.title: Memo
memo.description: The memo to include on the check

payTo.title: Pay to
payTo.description: The person or company the check is made out to

payees.title: Payees
payees.description: The list of recipients of the check

paymentMethod.title: Payment method
paymentMethod.description: The requested payment method for the check

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: The list of `Transaction` elements that detail the payments included with this check

paymentsToWrite.title: Payments to create
paymentsToWrite.description: The list of `Payments` used to populate a check during creation or edit

portion.title: Portion
portion.description: The amount of the primary payment that is allocated to this secondary check. Only applicable if `checkType` is `secondary`.

reportability.title: Reportability
reportability.description: Indicates whether the check should be reported as income to the appropriate tax agency. Only applicable if `checkType` is `primary`.

reportableAmount.title: Reportable amount
reportableAmount.description: The amount of the check that should be reported as income to the appropriate tax agency, if the check is considered to be reportable

scheduledSendDate.title: Scheduled send date
scheduledSendDate.description: The date that the check is scheduled to be sent. The scheduled send date begins at the start of this date in the server's timezone.

scheduledSendDateTime.title: Scheduled send date and time
scheduledSendDateTime.description: The date and time that the check is scheduled to be sent. This is an instant that occurs at midnight in the server's time zone.

servicePdEnd.title: Service period end
servicePdEnd.description: The end date and time of the service period for the check

servicePdStart.title: Service period start
servicePdStart.description: The start date and time of the service period for the check

CheckPortion.title: Check portion
CheckPortion.description: The amount of multi-payee check that is allocated to particular secondary `Check`

fixedAmount.title: Fixed amount
fixedAmount.description: The fixed amount to allocate to this check. Setting this value will null out the value of the `percentage` field.

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: The percentage of the overall amount to allocate to this check. Setting this value will null out the value of the `fixedAmount` field.

CheckRecurrence.title: Check recurrence
CheckRecurrence.description: Defines the recurrence schedule for a `Check`

firstDueDate.title: First due date
firstDueDate.description: The due date and time of the first check in the recurrence

issuanceDateOffset.title: Issuance date offset
issuanceDateOffset.description: The number of days before the due date that a check should be issued

monthlyFrequency.title: Monthly frequency
monthlyFrequency.description: The number of months between recurring checks. For example, a value of `1` will create a check every month, and a value of `3` will create a check every three months. Only applicable if `subtype` is `MonthlyCheckRecurrence`.

numChecks.title: Number of checks
numChecks.description: The number of checks in the recurrence

recurrenceDate.title: Recurrence date
recurrenceDate.description: The day of the month on which the check is due. For example, a value of `15` would result in recurring checks being due on the 15th day of the month. Only applicable if `subtype` is `MonthlyCheckRecurrence`. If `recurrenceDate` is set, `recurrenceDay` and `recurrenceWeek` should not be set.

recurrenceDay.title: Recurrence day
recurrenceDay.description: The day of the week on which the check is due

recurrenceWeek.title: Recurrence week
recurrenceWeek.description: The week of the month on which the check is due. Only applicable if `subtype` is `MonthlyCheckRecurrence`.

weeklyFrequency.title: Weekly frequency
weeklyFrequency.description: The number of weeks between recurring checks. For example, a value of `1` will create a check every week, and a value of `4` will create a check every four weeks. Only applicable if `subtype` is `WeeklyCheckRecurrence`.

CheckSet.title: Check set
CheckSet.description: A set of related checks that are submitted together for approval

approvalDate.title: Approval date
approvalDate.description: The date and time when this check set was approved or rejected

approvalStatus.title: Approval status
approvalStatus.description: Whether this check set has been approved, rejected, or is still awaiting approval

checks.title: Checks
checks.description: A list of references to `Check` elements that were created as part of this check set

createTime.title: Create time
createTime.description: The date and time when this `CheckSet` was created

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

primaryCheckToWrite.title: First primary check
primaryCheckToWrite.description: When creating a new `CheckSet`, this represents the primary check in the check set. After creation, this will be the primary check with the earliest scheduled send date, if this check set defines a recurrence.

recurrence.title: Recurrence
recurrence.description: Details of the recurrence schedule, if this set of checks should recur

requestingUser.title: Requesting user
requestingUser.description: A reference to the `User` that represents the caller that submitted this check set for approval

secondaryChecksToWrite.title: First secondary checks
secondaryChecksToWrite.description: When creating a new `CheckSet`, this represents the list of secondary checks in the check set. After creation, this will be the secondary checks with the earliest scheduled send date, if this check set defines a recurrence.

allValidationLevelsReached.title: All validation levels reached
allValidationLevelsReached.description: The list of all the validation levels that this claim has passed

assignedByUser.title: Assigned by user
assignedByUser.description: A reference to the `User` who last assigned or re-assigned this claim

assignedGroup.title: Assigned group
assignedGroup.description: A reference to the `Group` that this claim is currently assigned to

assignedQueue.title: Assigned queue
assignedQueue.description: A reference to the `AssignableQueue` that this claim is currently assigned to

assignedUser.title: Assigned user
assignedUser.description: A reference to the `User` that this claim is currently assigned to

assignmentStatus.title: Assignment status
assignmentStatus.description: The current assignment status of this claim, such as `assigned` or `unassigned`

claimNumber.title: Claim number
claimNumber.description: The claim number assigned to this claim

closeDate.title: Close date
closeDate.description: The date and time when this claim was closed

closedOutcome.title: Closed outcome
closedOutcome.description: The outcome reached when closing this claim

coverageInQuestion.title: Coverage in question
coverageInQuestion.description: A `true` value indicates that the claim might not be covered by the insured's policy

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the accident or loss

faultRating.title: Fault rating
faultRating.description: A determination of who is considered to be at fault

filterPropertyRiskUnits.title: Filter property risk units
filterPropertyRiskUnits.description: A list of `policySystemId` values for property risk units to include when retrieving the policy

filterVehicleRiskUnits.title: Filter vehicle risk units
filterVehicleRiskUnits.description: A list of `policySystemId` values for vehicle risk units to include when retrieving the policy

flagged.title: Flagged
flagged.description: Whether this claim has been flagged

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

incidentOnly.title: Incident only
incidentOnly.description: A `true` value indicates that this claim represents an incident report only and should not be processed further

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction that covers this loss. This jurisdiction may differ from the jurisdiction in which the loss occurred.

lobCode.title: Line of business code
lobCode.description: The line of business code for the policy line this claim is made against. If the policy only contains a single line of business, this will be set automatically when the claim is created, otherwise it must be specified manually.

lossDate.title: Loss date
lossDate.description: The date and time when the loss occurred

lossType.title: Loss type
lossType.description: The type of loss represented by this claim

policyAddresses.title: Policy addresses
policyAddresses.description: A list of addresses from the policy, which can then be used to set values of other fields such as the `lossLocation`

policyNumber.title: Policy number
policyNumber.description: The policy number of the insurance policy this claim is filed against

reportedByType.title: Reported by type
reportedByType.description: The relation between the insured party and the claim reporter

reportedDate.title: Reported date
reportedDate.description: The date and time when the claim was reported

segment.title: Segment
segment.description: The segment assigned to this claim

siuStatus.title: SIU status
siuStatus.description: The special investigation unit status of this claim

state.title: State
state.description: The status of the claim, such as `open` or `closed`

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: The strategy assigned to this claim

validationLevel.title: Validation level
validationLevel.description: The validation level of this claim. If the claim `state` is `open`, edits to this claim must continue to pass this validation rules at this level and all lower validation levels.

ClaimAddress.title: Claim address
ClaimAddress.description: A `ClaimAddress` represents an address that appears on a claim or policy. It combines standard address fields with policy identifiers.

addressLine1.title: Address line 1
addressLine1.description: The first line of the address

addressLine2.title: Address line 2
addressLine2.description: The second line of the address

addressLine3.title: Address line 3
addressLine3.description: The third line of the address

area.title: Area
area.description: The area of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

country.title: Country
country.description: The country of the address. The value of the `country` field will affect which other fields on the `ClaimAddress` are applicable.

county.title: County
county.description: The county of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

department.title: Department
department.description: The department of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted value of the address represented by this `ClaimAddress`, including all standard fields for the address's country

emirate.title: Emirate
emirate.description: The emirate of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

island.title: Island
island.description: The island of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

oblast.title: Oblast
oblast.description: The oblast of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

parish.title: Parish
parish.description: The parish of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

policyAddress.title: Policy address
policyAddress.description: A `true` value for this field indicates that this `ClaimAddress` is part of the claim's policy and cannot be edited directly

policyLabel.title: Policy label
policyLabel.description: Describes where on the policy this address came from. Only applicable if `policyAddress` is `true`.

postalCode.title: Postal code
postalCode.description: The postal code of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

prefecture.title: Prefecture
prefecture.description: The prefecture of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

province.title: Province
province.description: The province of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

state.title: State
state.description: The state of the address. Only applicable in certain countries.

ClaimAssignee.title: Claim assignee
ClaimAssignee.description: The target of an assignment action, such as a user/group combination or automatic rule-based assignment

autoAssign.title: Auto assign
autoAssign.description: Set to `true` to indicate the assignment should be done by assignment rules. Cannot be combined with any other assignment criteria fields.

groupId.title: Group ID
groupId.description: The `id` of the `Group` that the claim should be assigned to. If specified without the `userId` field, the `User` within the `Group` is selected by assignment rules. If specified along with the `userId` field, the `User` must be a member of the `Group`. That `User` is assigned the element.

name.title: Name
name.description: A human-readable name for the type of assignment that this `ClaimAssignee` represents

userId.title: User ID
userId.description: The `id` of the `User` that the claim should be assigned to. The `groupId` field must also be specified if the `userId` field is specified, and the `User` must be a member of that `Group` and have permission to be assigned the element.

addressBookUID.title: Address book UID
addressBookUID.description: The unique ID of this `ClaimContact` within the contact management system. Only applicable if the `ClaimContact` has been linked to a contact management system.

cellPhone.title: Cell phone
cellPhone.description: The person's mobile phone number. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

companyName.title: Company name
companyName.description: The name of the company represented by this `Contact`. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a company.

contactSubtype.title: Contact subtype
contactSubtype.description: The specific type of contact that this `ClaimContact` represents, such as `Person` or `Company`. The set of fields that can be set on a `ClaimContact` depend on its `contactSubtype`.

dateOfBirth.title: Date of birth
dateOfBirth.description: The person's date of birth. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: A formatted representation of the full name for this `ClaimContact', including all applicable fields such as `firstName` or `lastName`

editableRoles.title: Editable roles
editableRoles.description: The list of roles that this contact has on the claim and which are not otherwise represented by concrete fields such as `reporter` or `witness`. This list can be edited directly to change the roles assigned to this contact.

firstName.title: First name
firstName.description: The persons's first name. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

homePhone.title: Home phone
homePhone.description: The person's home phone number. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lastName.title: Last name
lastName.description: The person's last name. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

linkStatus.title: Link status
linkStatus.description: A code that indicates whether the contact is currently linked to the contact management system. Requesting this field will slow down API responses, since computing this value requires a call to the contact management system.

policySystemId.title: Policy system ID
policySystemId.description: The unique identifier of this element within the policy system

primaryPhone.title: Primary phone
primaryPhone.description: The contact's primary phone number, as determined by the type of phone number selected in the `primaryPhoneType` field

primaryPhoneType.title: Primary phone type
primaryPhoneType.description: The type of the contact's primary phone, such as `home` or `mobile`. Only applicable for a `ClaimContact` that represents a person.

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: The list of all roles that this contact has on the claim, including roles that are represented by concrete fields such as `reporter`. This field cannot be edited directly. To edit the roles assigned to a contact, use either the concrete fields on the appropriate element, such as `reporter` on `Claim`, or update the `editableRoles` field on the contact.

workPhone.title: Work phone
workPhone.description: The contact's work phone number, if this `Contact` represents a person, or the business's phone number, if this `Contact` represents a company

archiveState.title: Archive state
archiveState.description: The archive state of this claim info

claimNumber.title: Claim number
claimNumber.description: The claim number assigned to this claim

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

noticeDate.title: Reported date
noticeDate.description: The date and time when the claim was reported

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of the element

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

jsonPath.title: JSON path
jsonPath.description: The path to the referenced element within the overall JSON document

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the referenced element

uri.title: URI
uri.description: The canonical URI for the referenced element

ClaimSearchRequestAttributes.title: Claim search request attributes
ClaimSearchRequestAttributes.description: Criteria of the claim to search for

firstName.title: First name
firstName.description: The first name of a contact on the claim. By default the search will look for contacts who have the role of `claimant` on the claim. You can use the `nameSearchType` field to change the search to look for contacts with other roles, such as `insured`, or to search all contacts regardless of role.

lastName.title: Last name
lastName.description: The last name of a contact on the claim. By default the search will look for contacts who have the role of `claimant` on the claim. You can use the `nameSearchType` field to change the search to look for contacts with other roles, such as `insured`, or to search all contacts regardless of role.

nameSearchType.title: Name search type
nameSearchType.description: When searching by `firstName` or `lastName`, specifies which claim contacts to check based on the contact role. For example, when searching by last name, if this field is set to `insured`, the search will return any claim where the specified last name matches the last name of the contact who is designated as the insured.

ClaimSearchResult.title: Claim search results
ClaimSearchResult.description: Summary information about a active claim returned from a claim search request

adjusterName.title: Adjuster name
adjusterName.description: The name of the claim's assigned user, or information about the assignment status if the claim is unassigned

claimants.title: Claimants
claimants.description: A list of names of claimants on the claim

status.title: Status
status.description: The `state` of the claim, such as `open` or `closed`

ClaimSearchResultWrapper.title: Claim search results
ClaimSearchResultWrapper.description: Summary information about a active or archived claim returned from a claim search request

adjusterName.title: Adjuster name
adjusterName.description: The name of the claim's assigned user, or information about the assignment status if the claim is unassigned

archived.title: The claim was archived or not
archived.description: The claim was archived or not

archivedAdjuster.title: The adjuster that performed the archive
archivedAdjuster.description: The adjuster that performed the archive

claimants.title: Claimants
claimants.description: A list of names of claimants on the claim

flagged.title: Flagged
flagged.description: Whether this claim has been flagged

status.title: Status
status.description: The `state` of the claim, such as `open` or `closed`

ClaimSearchV2Attributes.title: Request attributes for active or archived claim search
ClaimSearchV2Attributes.description: Criteria of active or archived claims to search for

companyName.title: Company name
companyName.description: The name of a company on the claim. By default the search will look for contacts who have the role of `claimant` on the claim. You can use the `nameSearchType` field to change the search to look for contacts with other roles, such as `insured`, or to search all contacts regardless of role.

firstName.title: First name
firstName.description: The first name of a contact on the claim. By default the search will look for contacts who have the role of `claimant` on the claim. You can use the `nameSearchType` field to change the search to look for contacts with other roles, such as `insured`, or to search all contacts regardless of role.

lastName.title: Last name
lastName.description: The last name of a contact on the claim. By default the search will look for contacts who have the role of `claimant` on the claim. You can use the `nameSearchType` field to change the search to look for contacts with other roles, such as `insured`, or to search all contacts regardless of role.

nameSearchType.title: Name search type
nameSearchType.description: When searching by `firstName` or `lastName`, specifies which claim contacts to check based on the contact role. For example, when searching by last name, if this field is set to `insured`, the search will return any claim where the specified last name matches the last name of the contact who is designated as the insured.

ClaimSolrSearchRequestAttributes.title: Claim Solr search request attributes
ClaimSolrSearchRequestAttributes.description: Criteria of the claim to search for via Solr

address.title: Address
address.description: An address associated with the claim

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of a contact on the claim. By default the search will look for contacts who have any role on the claim. You can use the `nameSearchType` field to change the search to look for contacts with other roles, such as `insured`, or to search all contacts regardless of role.

nameSearchType.title: Name search type
nameSearchType.description: Specifies which claim contacts to check based on the contact role. For example, if this field is set to `insured`, the search will return any claim where the specified name matches the name of the contact who is designated as the insured.

phoneNumber.title: Phone number
phoneNumber.description: Phone number on the contact being searched for

ClaimSolrSearchResult.title: Claim Solr search results
ClaimSolrSearchResult.description: Summary information about a claim returned from a claim Solr search request

address.title: Address
address.description: The `address` of the contact matched to the search result

city.title: City
city.description: The `city` of the contact matched to the search result

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the contact matched to the search result

phoneNumber.title: Phone number
phoneNumber.description: The phone number associated with the contact matched to the search result

postalCode.title: Postal code
postalCode.description: The `postal code` on the address matched to the search result

rank.title: Rank
rank.description: The `rank` of the solr search result

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: The roles the contact holds on the search result

score.title: Score
score.description: The relevance `score` of the solr search result

state.title: State
state.description: The `state` on the address that was matched to the search result

status.title: Status
status.description: The `state` of the claim, such as `open` or `closed`

CodeReference.title: Code reference
CodeReference.description: A reference object that combines a code with a human-readable name

ContactRoleConstraint.title: Contact role constraint
ContactRoleConstraint.description: Defines constraints related to contact roles, such as whether the role is restricted to certain contact types and whether the role can be assigned to more than one contact

schemaConstraints.title: Schema constraints
schemaConstraints.description: A list of constraints specific to this role

subtype.title: Subtype
subtype.description: The subtype that a contact must be in order to have this role, if the role is restricted to a particular subtype

CovTerm.title: Coverage term
CovTerm.description: A term on a coverage, condition, or exclusion

code.title: Code
code.description: The classification code value for the term. Only applicable if `covTermSubtype` is `ClassificationCovTerm`.

covTermSubtype.title: Coverage term subtype
covTermSubtype.description: The specific subtype of coverage term. This field determines what other fields are available.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the classification code value for the term. Only applicable if `covTermSubtype` is `ClassificationCovTerm`.

financialAmount.title: Financial amount
financialAmount.description: The value of the coverage term as a monetary amount. Only applicable if `covTermSubtype` is `FinancialCovTerm`.

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

numericValue.title: Numeric value
numericValue.description: The value of the coverage term as a decimal. Only applicable if `covTermSubtype` is `NumericCovTerm`.

policySystemId.title: Policy system ID
policySystemId.description: The unique identifier of this element within the policy system

units.title: Units
units.description: The type of units that apply to the `numericValue` of this coverage term. Only applicable if `covTermSubtype` is `NumericCovTerm`.

Coverage.title: Coverage
Coverage.description: A coverage, condition, or exclusion on an insurance policy or risk unit

claimAggLimit.title: PIP claim aggregate limit
claimAggLimit.description: The per-claim limit of PIP coverage. Only applicable to PIP vehicle coverages.

coinsurance.title: Coinsurance
coinsurance.description: The coinsurance percentage. Only applicable to property coverages.

covTerms.title: Coverage terms
covTerms.description: The list of terms for this coverage

coverageBasis.title: Coverage basis
coverageBasis.description: The method used for determining the coverage value for damaged property. Only applicable to property coverages.

coverageType.title: Coverage type
coverageType.description: The specific type of coverage represented by this element. The `coverageType` corresponds to the particular coverage code within the policy system.

effectiveDate.title: Effective date
effectiveDate.description: The date and time when this coverage became effective

expirationDate.title: Expiration date
expirationDate.description: The date and time when this coverage ceased being effective

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

limitsIndicator.title: Limits indicator
limitsIndicator.description: Indicates whether the coverage limits are part of a combined single limit

nonmedAggLimit.title: PIP non-medical aggregate limit
nonmedAggLimit.description: The aggregate limit for non-medical PIP coverage. Only applicable to PIP vehicle coverages.

personAggLimit.title: PIP per-person aggregate limit
personAggLimit.description: The aggregate limit per-person for PIP coverage. Only applicable to PIP vehicle coverages.

policySystemId.title: Policy system ID
policySystemId.description: The unique identifier of this element within the policy system

replaceAggLimit.title: PIP replacement aggregate limit
replaceAggLimit.description: The aggregate limit for PIP lost wage and replacement services coverage. Only applicable to PIP vehicle coverages.

state.title: State
state.description: The state that this coverage is applicable, if the coverage is state-specific

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Deductible amount to be applied to a payment

amountApplied.title: Amount applied
amountApplied.description: The amount applied on this deductible

amountRemaining.title: Amount remaining
amountRemaining.description: The amount of this deductible that has not yet been applied

waived.title: Waived
waived.description: Specifies whether this deductible has been waived

Endorsement.title: Endorsement
Endorsement.description: Represents an endorsement form applied to a policy that makes some modification to it

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the endorsement and what it alters

effectiveDate.title: Effective date
effectiveDate.description: The date and time when the endorsement becomes effective

expirationDate.title: Expiration date
expirationDate.description: The date and time when the endorsement ceases to be effective

formNumber.title: Form number
formNumber.description: The code for the endorsement form

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

Exposure.title: Exposure
Exposure.description: An object on a claim that manages potential payments from a specific coverage to a specific claimant

allValidationLevelsReached.title: All validation levels reached
allValidationLevelsReached.description: The list of all the validation levels that this exposure has passed

assignedByUser.title: Assigned by user
assignedByUser.description: A reference to the `User` who last assigned this exposure

assignedGroup.title: Assigned group
assignedGroup.description: A reference to the `Group` that this exposure is assigned to

assignedQueue.title: Assigned queue
assignedQueue.description: A reference to the `AssignableQueue` that this exposure is assigned to

assignedUser.title: Assigned user
assignedUser.description: A reference to the `User` that this exposure is assigned to

assignmentStatus.title: Assignment status
assignmentStatus.description: The assignment status of this exposure, such as `assigned` or `unassigned`

autopilotStatus.title: Autopilot status
autopilotStatus.description: The status of this exposure in the Claims Autopilot automated system. Only intended for use by the Claims Autopilot system.

claimOrder.title: Claim order
claimOrder.description: The assigned number of this exposure

claimantType.title: Claimant type
claimantType.description: The relationship of this exposure's claimant to the policy holder

closeDate.title: Close date
closeDate.description: The date and time when this exposure was closed

closedOutcome.title: Closed outcome
closedOutcome.description: The outcome reached when closing this exposure

contactPermitted.title: Contact permitted
contactPermitted.description: Indicates whether contact is permitted with the claimant for this exposure

coverage.title: Coverage
coverage.description: A reference to the `Coverage` that applies to this exposure

coverageSubtype.title: Coverage subtype
coverageSubtype.description: The subtype of coverage that applies to this exposure

createdVia.title: Created via
createdVia.description: Indicates how this exposure was created, such as user entry or automated rules

deductible.title: Deductible
deductible.description: Deductible on the coverage associated with this exposure

fixedPropertyIncident.title: Fixed property incident
fixedPropertyIncident.description: A reference to the `FixedPropertyIncident` associated with this exposure

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

injuryIncident.title: Injury incident
injuryIncident.description: A reference to the `InjuryIncident` associated with this exposure

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: The legal jurisdiction that applies to this exposure, if that jurisdiction differs from the jurisdiction where the loss occurred

lossCategory.title: Loss category
lossCategory.description: The detailed category that describes the loss

lossParty.title: Loss party
lossParty.description: The type of loss party, generally either the insured or a third party

otherCoverage.title: Other coverage
otherCoverage.description: A `true` value indicates that the claimant has additional coverage

otherStructureIncident.title: Other structure incident
otherStructureIncident.description: A reference to the `OtherStructureIncident` associated with this exposure

primaryCoverage.title: Primary coverage
primaryCoverage.description: The type of coverage that applies to this exposure

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: Indicates the current progress for an open exposure

propertyContentsIncident.title: Property contents incident
propertyContentsIncident.description: A reference to the `PropertyContentsIncident` associated with this exposure

reopenDate.title: Reopen date
reopenDate.description: The date and time when this exposure was reopened

reopenedReason.title: Reopen reason
reopenedReason.description: The reason why this exposure was reopened

securityLevel.title: Security level
securityLevel.description: The security level of this exposure

segment.title: Segment
segment.description: The segment assigned to this exposure

state.title: State
state.description: The current status of the exposure, such as `open` or `closed`

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: The strategy assigned to this exposure

tier.title: Tier
tier.description: The tier of this exposure, used to decide how to rate the exposure metrics

type.title: Type
type.description: The general type of the exposure

validationLevel.title: Validation level
validationLevel.description: The validation level of this exposure. If the exposure `state` is `open`, edits to this exposure must pass validation rules at this validation level and all lower validation levels.

vehicleIncident.title: Vehicle incident
vehicleIncident.description: A reference to the `VehicleIncident` associated with this exposure

ExposureAssignee.title: Exposure assignee
ExposureAssignee.description: The target of an assignment action, such as a user/group combination or automatic rule-based assignment

autoAssign.title: Auto assign
autoAssign.description: Set to `true` to indicate the assignment should be done by assignment rules. Cannot be combined with any other assignment criteria fields.

claimOwner.title: Claim owner
claimOwner.description: Set to `true` to indicate that the exposure should be assigned to the same user and group that own the exposure's claim

groupId.title: Group ID
groupId.description: The ID of the `Group` that the exposure should be assigned to. If specified without the `userId` field, the `User` within the `Group` is selected by assignment rules. If specified along with the `userId` field, that specific `User` is assigned the element.

name.title: Name
name.description: A human-readable name for the type of assignment that this `ExposureAssignee` represents

userId.title: User ID
userId.description: The ID of the `User` that the exposure should be assigned to. The `groupId` field must also be specified if the `userId` field is specified, and the `User` must be a member of that `Group` and have permission to be assigned the element.

FixedPropertyIncident.title: Fixed property incident
FixedPropertyIncident.description: A report of an incident involving property at a fixed location such as a building

automationPath.title: Automation path
automationPath.description: The path taken by the automated system that created this incident. Only intended for use by automated systems.

description.title: Description
description.description: A general description of the incident

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lossParty.title: Loss party
lossParty.description: The type of loss party, generally either the insured or a third party

occupancyType.title: Occupancy type
occupancyType.description: The occupancy status of the property

InjuryBodyPart.title: Injured body party
InjuryBodyPart.description: Details of an injury to a specific body part

detailedBodyPart.title: Detailed body part
detailedBodyPart.description: The specific body part that was injured

detailedBodyPartDesc.title: Detailed body part description
detailedBodyPartDesc.description: A more specific code for the injury, used if the value of the `detailedBodyPart` field can be further refined

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

impairmentPercentage.title: Impairment percentage
impairmentPercentage.description: Percentage of permanent impairment in functionality

ordering.title: Ordering
ordering.description: The order of this element relative to other body parts on the same injury incident

primaryBodyPart.title: Primary body part
primaryBodyPart.description: The area of the body where the injury is located

sideOfBody.title: Side of body
sideOfBody.description: The side of the body on which the injury is located

ambulanceUsed.title: Ambulance used
ambulanceUsed.description: A `true` value indicates that an ambulance was used

automationPath.title: Automation path
automationPath.description: The path taken by the automated system that created this incident. Only intended for use by automated systems.

bodyParts.title: Body parts
bodyParts.description: A list of `InjuryBodyPart` elements that describe the specific injuries that were sustained

dateOfDeath.title: Date of death
dateOfDeath.description: The date of death, if the severity of this incident is `fatal`

description.title: Description
description.description: A general description of the incident

detailedInjuryType.title: Detailed injury type
detailedInjuryType.description: A more specific categorization of the injury

disabledDueToAccident.title: Disabled due to accident
disabledDueToAccident.description: The level of disability caused by the injury

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lossParty.title: Loss party
lossParty.description: The type of loss party, generally either the insured or a third party

lostWages.title: Lost wages
lostWages.description: A `true` value indicates that the injured person lost wages as a result of the injury

treatmentType.title: Treatment type
treatmentType.description: The type of treatment received for the injury

IntakeInteraction.title: Intake interaction
IntakeInteraction.description: A request to gather data from a claim contact, such as the insured or a claimant, using an intake flow

claimContact.title: Claim contact
claimContact.description: The contact who will provide data via an intake flow, such as the insured or a claimant

claimSnapshotURL.title: Claim snapshot URL
claimSnapshotURL.description: Snapshot URL of the claim from AppEvents service, which led to this interaction. Provides claim data for subsequent processing.

createTime.title: Create time
createTime.description: The date and time when this `IntakeInteraction` was created

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of this IntakeInteraction, for display to the claim contact who will fulfill it

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

intakeId.title: Intake flow ID
intakeId.description: Identifier of the intake flow to be presented to the claim contact to gather data

intakeInputs.title: Intake inputs
intakeInputs.description: A JSON object that contains data for use by the intake flow that is not available on the claim

intakeResults.title: Intake results
intakeResults.description: A JSON object that contains the payload of intake answers

relatedEntity.title: Related entity
relatedEntity.description: Entity on the claim that is the root of the intake flow, and to which answer data from the flow will be saved

OtherStructureIncident.title: Other structure incident
OtherStructureIncident.description: A loss involving structures other than the main dwelling, such as a secondary building like a shed or artists studio

fencesDamaged.title: Fences damaged
fencesDamaged.description: A `true` value indicates that the fence was damaged

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lossParty.title: Loss party
lossParty.description: The type of loss party, generally either the insured or a third-party

Payee.title: Payee
Payee.description: The contact that is a payee for a check

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: A reference to the `ClaimContact` that represents the payee

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

Policy.title: Policy
Policy.description: A copy of the policy that a claim has been filed against. Each `Claim` has its own copy of the associated policy.

accountNumber.title: Account number
accountNumber.description: The account number for the account that this policy belongs to

assignedRisk.title: Assigned risk
assignedRisk.description: A `true` value indicates that this policy is written as part of a program mandated by the government for covering the worst risks

cancellationDate.title: Cancellation date
cancellationDate.description: The date and time when this policy was cancelled

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency for this policy. Updating this value will also update the claim's currency.

effectiveDate.title: Effective date
effectiveDate.description: The date and time when this policy became effective

expirationDate.title: Expiration date
expirationDate.description: The date and time when this policy ceased to be in effect

foreignCoverage.title: Foreign coverage
foreignCoverage.description: A `true` value indicates that the insured has foreign coverage

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

originalEffectiveDate.title: Original effective date
originalEffectiveDate.description: The date and time when the policy holder first had coverage

policyLocations.title: Policy locations
policyLocations.description: A list of references to `PolicyLocation` elements that represent locations that appear on this policy

policyNumber.title: Policy number
policyNumber.description: The policy number assigned to this policy

policyType.title: Policy type
policyType.description: The type of policy. This generally corresponds to the insurance product for that policy.

producerCode.title: Producer code
producerCode.description: The producer code for the agency responsible for this policy

serviceTier.title: Service tier
serviceTier.description: The customer service tier for this policy

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the policy, such as `inforce` or `canceled`

underwritingCo.title: Underwriting company
underwritingCo.description: The underwriting company for this policy

underwritingGroup.title: Underwriting group
underwritingGroup.description: The underwriting group for this policy

verifiedPolicy.title: Verified policy
verifiedPolicy.description: A `true` value indicates that the policy has not been edited since it was retrieved from the policy system

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of this location

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

locationNumber.title: Location number
locationNumber.description: The location number automatically assigned to this location in the context of the policy

policySystemId.title: Policy system ID
policySystemId.description: The unique identifier of this element within the policy system

primaryLocation.title: Primary location
primaryLocation.description: A `true` value indicates that this location is the primary location on the policy

PolicyObjectReference.title: Policy object reference
PolicyObjectReference.description: A reference to an element that exists on the claim's copy of the policy

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of the referenced element

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

jsonPath.title: JSON path
jsonPath.description: The path to the referenced element within the overall JSON document

policyLabel.title: Policy label
policyLabel.description: A label that describes the context in which the referenced element appears on the policy

policySystemId.title: Policy system ID
policySystemId.description: The unique identifier of this element within the policy system

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the referenced element

uri.title: URI
uri.description: The canonical URI for the referenced element

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lossParty.title: Loss party
lossParty.description: The type of loss party, generally either the insured or a third-party

RecoveryReserveSet.title: Recovery reserve set
RecoveryReserveSet.description: A set of related recovery reserve transactions that are submitted together for approval

approvalDate.title: Approval date
approvalDate.description: The date and time when this recovery reserve set was approved or rejected

approvalStatus.title: Approval status
approvalStatus.description: Whether this recovery reserve set is approved, rejected, or awaiting approval

createTime.title: Create time
createTime.description: The date and time when this `RecoveryReserveSet` was created

createdVia.title: Created via
createdVia.description: Indicates how this recovery reserve set was created, such as user entry or automated rules

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

recoveryReserves.title: RecoveryReserves
recoveryReserves.description: The list of `RecoveryReserves` that define the recovery reserve transactions that are part of this set

recoveryReservesToWrite.title: RecoveryReserves to write
recoveryReservesToWrite.description: The list of `RecoveryReserves` used to populate a recovery reserve set during creation or edit

requestingUser.title: Requesting user
requestingUser.description: A reference to the `User` that represents the caller that submitted this recovery reserve set for approval

RecoverySet.title: Recovery set
RecoverySet.description: A set of related recovery transactions that are submitted together for approval

approvalDate.title: Approval date
approvalDate.description: The date and time when this recovery set was approved or rejected

approvalStatus.title: Approval status
approvalStatus.description: Whether this recovery set is approved, rejected, or awaiting approval

createTime.title: Create time
createTime.description: The date and time when this `RecoverySet` was created

createdVia.title: Created via
createdVia.description: Indicates how this recovery set was created, such as user entry or automated rules

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

recoveries.title: Recoveries
recoveries.description: The list of `Transaction` elements that define the recovery transactions that are part of this set

recoveriesToWrite.title: Recoveries to write
recoveriesToWrite.description: The list of `Recoveries` used to populate a recovery set during creation or edit

requestingUser.title: Requesting user
requestingUser.description: A reference to the `User` that represents the caller that submitted this recovery set for approval

ReserveSet.title: Reserve set
ReserveSet.description: A set of related reserve transactions that are submitted together for approval

approvalDate.title: Approval date
approvalDate.description: The date and time when this reserve set was approved or rejected

approvalStatus.title: Approval status
approvalStatus.description: Whether this reserve set is approved, rejected, or awaiting approval

createTime.title: Create time
createTime.description: The date and time when this `ReserveSet` was created

createdVia.title: Created via
createdVia.description: Indicates how this reserve set was created, such as user entry or automated rules

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

requestingUser.title: Requesting user
requestingUser.description: A reference to the `User` that represents the caller that submitted this reserve set for approval

reserves.title: Reserves
reserves.description: The list of `Transaction` elements that define the reserve transactions that are part of this set

reservesToWrite.title: Reserves to write
reservesToWrite.description: The list of `Reserves` used to populate a reserve set during creation or edit

RoleSchemaConstraint.title: Role schema constraint
RoleSchemaConstraint.description: A constraint that applies to how roles can be assigned to contacts

constraints.title: Constraints
constraints.description: A list of specific constraints, for example that the role is required or can only be held by one contact

exceptionSubtypes.title: Exception subtypes
exceptionSubtypes.description: A list of exceptions to the `subtype` defined on the containing constraint that allow additional contact types to have this role when it is related to the type of element defined in the `schema` field

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: The type of owning element that this constraint applies to. For example, a `schema` value of `Claim` means that this constraint applies when the role is related to the claim itself and not to another element such as an exposure.

SchemaConstraint.title: Schema constraint
SchemaConstraint.description: A specific constraint for a contact role in the context of a related element

additionalInfoList.title: Additional info list
additionalInfoList.description: A list of additional criteria for the constraint, such as specific loss types or exposure types that it applies to

constraintType.title: Constraint type
constraintType.description: The type of constraint. Possible values include `Prohibited`, `Exclusive`, `Required`, and `ZeroToMore`.

ServiceRequest.title: Service request
ServiceRequest.description: Represents a unit of work requested of a specialist or vendor, including instructions that describe the work to be done and its current state

assignedGroup.title: Assigned group
assignedGroup.description: A reference to the `Group` that this service request is assigned to

assignedUser.title: Assigned user
assignedUser.description: A reference to the `User` that this service request is assigned to

assignmentDate.title: Assignment date
assignmentDate.description: The date when this service request was last assigned. For precision across timezones, use `assignmentDateTime` field.

assignmentDateTime.title: Assignment date time
assignmentDateTime.description: The date and time when this service request was last assigned

canceledReason.title: Canceled reason
canceledReason.description: The reason this service request was canceled

claim.title: Claim
claim.description: A reference to the `Claim` that this service request is associated with

createTime.title: Create time
createTime.description: The date and time when this `ServiceRequest` was created

expectedQuoteCompletionDate.title: Expected quote completion date
expectedQuoteCompletionDate.description: The date by which the specialist expects to submit the quote. For precision across timezones, use `expectedQuoteCompletionDateTime` field.

expectedQuoteCompletionDateTime.title: Expected quote completion date time
expectedQuoteCompletionDateTime.description: The date and time by which the specialist expects to submit the quote

expectedServiceCompletionDate.title: Expected service completion date
expectedServiceCompletionDate.description: The date by which the specialist expects to complete the work. For precision across timezones, use `expectedServiceCompletionDateTime` field.

expectedServiceCompletionDateTime.title: Expected service completion date time
expectedServiceCompletionDateTime.description: The date and time by which the specialist expects to complete the work

exposure.title: Exposure
exposure.description: A reference to the `Exposure` that this service request is associated with

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

incident.title: Incident
incident.description: A reference to the `Incident` that this service request is associated with

instruction.title: Instruction
instruction.description: The active instruction associated with this service request

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: The kind of service request, such as `quoteonly` or `quoteandservice`. This determines the workflow for managing this service request.

latestQuote.title: Latest quote
latestQuote.description: The latest quote associated with this service request

nextStep.title: Next step
nextStep.description: The next action to be taken in the lifecycle of this service request

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: This service request's place in its life cycle

quoteStatus.title: Quote status
quoteStatus.description: The quote status for this service request

referenceNumber.title: Reference number
referenceNumber.description: A string identifier assigned to this service request by the specialist

requestedQuoteCompletionDate.title: Requested quote completion date
requestedQuoteCompletionDate.description: The desired date by which the specialist will have submitted the quote. For precision across timezones, use `requestedQuoteCompletionDateTime` field.

requestedQuoteCompletionDateTime.title: Requested quote completion date time
requestedQuoteCompletionDateTime.description: The desired date and time by which the specialist will have submitted the quote

requestedServiceCompletionDate.title: Requested service completion date
requestedServiceCompletionDate.description: The desired date by which the specialist will have completed the work. For precision across timezones, use `requestedServiceCompletionDateTime` field.

requestedServiceCompletionDateTime.title: Requested service completion date time
requestedServiceCompletionDateTime.description: The desired date and time by which the specialist will have completed the work

serviceRequestNumber.title: Service request number
serviceRequestNumber.description: A globally unique, user-readable identifier for this service request. This number is normally generated within the application.

specialist.title: Specialist
specialist.description: The vendor or internal entity selected to do the work requested by this service request

specialistCommMethod.title: Specialist communication method
specialistCommMethod.description: The channel through which the carrier will communicate with the specialist

tier.title: Tier
tier.description: The tier of this service request

ServiceRequestAction.title: Service request action
ServiceRequestAction.description: An action that can be taken on a service request

defaultOperation.title: Default operation
defaultOperation.description: The type of operation this action performs when invoked

ServiceRequestAssignee.title: Service request assignee
ServiceRequestAssignee.description: The target of an assignment action, such as a user/group combination or automatic rule-based assignment

autoAssign.title: Auto assign
autoAssign.description: Set to `true` to indicate the assignment should be done by assignment rules. Cannot be combined with any other assignment criteria fields.

claimOwner.title: Claim owner
claimOwner.description: Set to `true` to indicate that the service request should be assigned to the same user and group that own the service request's claim

groupId.title: Group ID
groupId.description: The `id` of the `Group` that the service request should be assigned to. If specified without the `userId` field, the `User` within the `Group` is selected by assignment rules. If specified along with the `userId` field, that `User` must be a member of the `Group`, and that `User` is assigned the service request.

name.title: Name
name.description: A human-readable name for the type of assignment that this `ServiceRequestAssignee` represents

userId.title: User ID
userId.description: The ID of the `User` that the service request should be assigned to. The `groupId` field must also be specified if the `userId` field is specified, and the `User` must be a member of that `Group` and have permission to be assigned the element.

ServiceRequestInstruction.title: Service request instruction
ServiceRequestInstruction.description: A set of instructions to be transmitted to the specialist who will work on a service request

customer.title: Customer
customer.description: The contact with whom the specialist should coordinate to perform the work

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

instructionText.title: Instruction text
instructionText.description: The instructions to be provided to the specialist

serviceAddress.title: Service address
serviceAddress.description: The location at which the service is to be performed

services.title: Services
services.description: The services to be performed for this set of instructions

ServiceRequestInvoiceOperationContext.title: Service request invoice operation context
ServiceRequestInvoiceOperationContext.description: Additional details regarding an operation performed on a service request invoice

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: The reason the operation is being performed

check.title: Check
check.description: A reference to the `Check` associated with the invoice payment

ServiceRequestOperationContext.title: Service request operation context
ServiceRequestOperationContext.description: Additional details regarding an operation performed on a service request

expectedCompletionDate.title: Expected completion date
expectedCompletionDate.description: The date by which the specialist expects to complete the work

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: The reason the operation is being performed

requestedCompletionDate.title: Requested completion date
requestedCompletionDate.description: The requested quote or service completion date

statement.title: Statement
statement.description: The service request statement associated with this operation

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of the referenced element

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

jsonPath.title: JSON path
jsonPath.description: The path to the referenced element within the overall JSON document

referenceNumber.title: Reference number
referenceNumber.description: The `referenceNumber` of the referenced service request

serviceRequestNumber.title: Reference number
serviceRequestNumber.description: The `serviceRequestNumber` of the referenced service request

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the referenced element

uri.title: URI
uri.description: The canonical URI for the referenced element

ServiceRequestSimpleOperationContext.title: Service request simple operation context
ServiceRequestSimpleOperationContext.description: Additional details regarding a simple operation performed on a service request

ServiceRequestStatement.title: Service request statement
ServiceRequestStatement.description: A statement received from a specialist related to a service request, such as a quote or invoice

approvalDate.title: Approval date
approvalDate.description: The date and time when this statement was approved

approvedBy.title: Approved by
approvedBy.description: A reference to the `User` that represents the calling user or service that approved this statement

creationTime.title: Creation time
creationTime.description: The date and time when this statement was created

declinedReason.title: Declined reason
declinedReason.description: The reason the statement was declined

expectedDaysToPerformService.title: Expected days to perform service
expectedDaysToPerformService.description: The number of business days the specialist expects it will take to perform the service. Only applicable if `subtype` is `ServiceRequestQuote`.

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lineItems.title: Line items
lineItems.description: The list of line items for this statement

operationContext.title: Operation context
operationContext.description: Additional details about this statement. Only applicable if `subtype` is `ServiceRequestInvoice`.

paymentDate.title: Payment date
paymentDate.description: The date when this invoice was paid. Only applicable if `subtype` is `ServiceRequestInvoice`. For precision across timezones, use `paymentDateTime` field.

paymentDateTime.title: Payment date time
paymentDateTime.description: The date and time when this invoice was paid. Only applicable if `subtype` is `ServiceRequestInvoice`.

referenceNumber.title: Reference number
referenceNumber.description: An identifier assigned to this statement by the specialist

source.title: Statement source
source.description: The source for this statement, such as manual entry or an external system

status.title: Status
status.description: The current invoice status. Only applicable if `subtype` is `ServiceRequestInvoice`.

subtype.title: Subtype
subtype.description: The specific type of statement, such as `ServiceRequestInvoice` or `ServiceRequestQuote`

total.title: Total
total.description: The sum of all the line items on this statement

ServiceRequestStatementLineItem.title: Service request statement line item
ServiceRequestStatementLineItem.description: A single line item on a service request statement

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the line item

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

SpecialistService.title: Specialist service
SpecialistService.description: A particular service category that a specialist is able to provide

active.title: Active
active.description: A `true` value indicates that this service is active for the specialist and can be used for new service requests

code.title: Code
code.description: A unique code identifying the service

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: A reference to the service code that is the parent of this service code

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: A financial transaction for a claim or exposure. Transactions are either reserves, payments, recoveries, or recovery reserves.

bookingDate.title: Booking date
bookingDate.description: The date and time when the transaction was submitted

claimToReportingExchangeRate.title: Claim to reporting exchange rate
claimToReportingExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate from the claim currency to the reporting currency

coverage.title: Coverage
coverage.description: The `primaryCoverage` on the exposure this transaction applies to

createTime.title: Create time
createTime.description: The date and time when this `Transaction` was created

createdVia.title: Created via
createdVia.description: Indicates how this transaction was created, such as user entry or automated rules

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency of this transaction's amount

eroding.title: Eroding
eroding.description: A `true` value indicates that this transaction erodes the reserves for the associated reserve line. Only applicable if `type` is `Payment`.

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lineItems.title: Line items
lineItems.description: The list of line items that are part of this transaction

paymentType.title: Payment type
paymentType.description: The type of payment, either `partial`, `final`, or `supplement`. Only applicable if `type` is `Payment`.

reserveLine.title: Reserve line
reserveLine.description: The coding for this transaction that determines how it will affect reserves for the claim or exposure

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of this transaction

subtype.title: Type
subtype.description: The type of this transaction, such as `Payment` or `Reserve`

transToClaimExchangeRate.title: Transaction to claim exchange rate
transToClaimExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate from the transaction currency to the claim currency

transToReservingExchangeRate.title: Transaction to reserving exchange rate
transToReservingExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate from the transaction currency to the reserving currency

TransactionCoding.title: Transaction coding
TransactionCoding.description: A unique combination of an exposure, cost category, cost type, and reserving currency that is used to group transactions for a particular claim in order to establish reserves and make payments against them

costCategory.title: Cost category
costCategory.description: The cost category for the transaction

costType.title: Cost type
costType.description: The cost type for the transaction

exposure.title: Exposure
exposure.description: A reference to the `Exposure` that the transaction applies to

recoveryCategory.title: Recovery category
recoveryCategory.description: The recovery category for the transaction. Only applicable if the `type` of the transaction is `Recovery` or `RecoveryReserve`.

reservingCurrency.title: Reserving currency
reservingCurrency.description: The reserving currency for the transaction

TransactionExchangeRate.title: Transaction exchange rate
TransactionExchangeRate.description: An exchange rate between two currencies

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the exchange rate

market.title: Market
market.description: A `true` value indicates that this exchange rate will appear in searches for the latest market rates

TransactionLineItem.title: Transaction line item
TransactionLineItem.description: A line item on a transaction

claimAmount.title: Claim amount
claimAmount.description: The amount of this line item in the claim currency

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: A description of the line item

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lineCategory.title: Line category
lineCategory.description: The category for this line item

reportingAmount.title: Reporting amount
reportingAmount.description: The amount of this line item in the reporting currency

reservingAmount.title: Reserving amount
reservingAmount.description: The amount of this line item in the currency used for reserves

transactionAmount.title: Transaction amount
transactionAmount.description: The amount of this line item in transaction currency

UnverifiedPolicyLocation.title: Unverified policy location
UnverifiedPolicyLocation.description: A policy location on an unverified policy. An unverified policy is a policy that was manually entered or modified, and therefore it may not match the information in the policy system.

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of this location

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

locationNumber.title: Location number
locationNumber.description: The location number in the context of the policy

policySystemId.title: Policy system ID
policySystemId.description: The unique identifier of this element within the policy system

primaryLocation.title: Primary location
primaryLocation.description: A `true` value indicates that this location is the primary location on the policy

UpdatablePolicyObjectReference.title: Updatable policy object reference
UpdatablePolicyObjectReference.description: A reference to an object, such as a location or vehicle, that may exist on the policy or which may only exist on the claim

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of the element

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

jsonPath.title: JSON path
jsonPath.description: The path to the referenced element within the overall JSON document

policySystemId.title: Policy system ID
policySystemId.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element within the policy system

refid.title: Reference ID
refid.description: A unique identifier given to the newly created element in the context of the current request

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the referenced element

uri.title: URI
uri.description: The canonical URI for the referenced element

ValidationIssue.title: Validation issue
ValidationIssue.description: An error or warning raised during validation

field.title: Field
field.description: The field that the issue applies to

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the element that the issue applies to

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The severity of the issue, either `error` or `warning`

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of element that the issue applies to

url.title: URL
url.description: The canonical URI of the element that the issue applies to

validationLevel.title: Validation level
validationLevel.description: The validation level that this issue was raised at

ValidationResult.title: Validation result
ValidationResult.description: The results of running validation rules against an element

allValidationLevelsReached.title: All validation levels reached
allValidationLevelsReached.description: The list of all the validation levels that were passed by the root element being validated

hasErrors.title: Has errors
hasErrors.description: A `true` value indicates that there are one or more issues with a `severity` or `error` on this result

validationIssues.title: Validation issues
validationIssues.description: The list of specific validation issues that were raised by rules

validationLevelReached.title: Validation level reached
validationLevelReached.description: The highest validation level that was passed by the root element being validated

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of this vehicle

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

licensePlate.title: License plate
licensePlate.description: The license plate number of this vehicle

policyLabel.title: Policy label
policyLabel.description: Describes where on the policy this vehicle came from. Only applicable if `policyVehicle` is `true`.

policySystemId.title: Policy system ID
policySystemId.description: The unique identifier of this element within the policy system

policyVehicle.title: Policy vehicle
policyVehicle.description: A `true` value indicates that this `Vehicle` is part of the claim's policy and cannot be edited directly

state.title: State
state.description: The jurisdiction in which this vehicle is registered

vin.title: VIN
vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number of this vehicle

year.title: Year
year.description: The model year of this vehicle

VehicleIncident.title: Vehicle incident
VehicleIncident.description: A vehicle that suffered loss or damage

automationPath.title: Automation path
automationPath.description: The path taken by the automated system that created this incident. Only intended for use by automated systems.

childSafetySeatStatus.title: Child safety seat status
childSafetySeatStatus.description: The status of the child safety seat, for example instance whether it was occupied or unoccupied

damageDescription.title: Description
damageDescription.description: A general description of the damage

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

lossParty.title: Loss party
lossParty.description: The type of loss party, generally either the insured or a third-party

propertyValue.title: Property value
propertyValue.description: The estimated value of the property that was lost or damaged

valuationRequired.title: Valuation required
valuationRequired.description: Whether a valuation should be or has been requested, possibly with a reason given

valuationSource.title: Valuation source
valuationSource.description: The source of the property valuation

vehicle.title: Vehicle
vehicle.description: The vehicle involved in the loss
